message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking of a slightly lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we settle on $108?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $106?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession. How about we settle on $109?
I understand you're making one final concession, but I'm still not willing to go above $107. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $107?
I've made my final concession, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
